predicate.note: Frames file for 'whiten' based on frame file for 'activate'. Verbnet class 45.4, other members include activate, age, balance, blur, darken, hasten, laminate, magnetize, revive, ripen, sicken, stabilize, sour, tilt, unwind.

example.name: whiten
example.text: [Many of the jade pieces in the pits]-9 were whitened [*]-9, for example, and the edges of the bronzes were curled and warped.
example.arg: [*]-9 -> Many of the jade peices in the pits
